import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {'Software System': [], 'Physical Device': [], 'Environment Object': [], 'External System': [], 'System Requirements': [], 'Shared Phenomena': []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

    entities = {'Software System': [], 'Physical Device': [], 'Environment Object': [], 'External System': [], 'System Requirements': [], 'Shared Phenomena': []}

        elif ent.label_ == "EVENT":
            entities['System Requirements'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "NORP":
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(ent.text)
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+-\d+|\w+\s\w+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("These UAVs shall include the Tactical Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (TUAV) and the Medium Altitude and Endurance (MAE) UAV (henceforth referred to as Outrider and Predator respectively), their associated payloads, and other network communication systems."))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Software|System)\s+(?P<name>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Physical|Device)\s+(?P<name>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Environment|Object)\s+(?P<name>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(External|System)\s+(?P<name>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(System|Requirements)\s+(?P<name>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Shared|Phenomena)\s+(?P<name>\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return {key: value for key, value in entities.items() if value}

        'Environment Object': [],

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+ object)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'requirements'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, input_string)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

The code defines a function `extract_entities` that takes a sentence as input and returns a dictionary with the extracted entities. The function uses regular expressions to match the patterns of the different entity types. The regular expressions are defined as follows:

*   `software_system_pattern`: matches the pattern of a software system, which is a string that starts with a capital letter, followed by lowercase letters, and ends with the word "system".
*   `physical_device_pattern`: matches the pattern of a physical device, which is a string that starts with a capital letter, followed by lowercase letters, and ends with the word "device".
*   `environment_object_pattern`: matches the pattern of an environment object, which is a string that starts with a capital letter, followed by lowercase letters, and ends with the word "environment".
*   `external_system_pattern`: matches the pattern of an external system, which is a string that starts with a capital letter, followed by lowercase letters, and ends with the word "system".
*   `system_requirements_pattern`: matches the pattern of system requirements, which is a string that starts with a capital letter, followed by lowercase letters, and ends with the word "requirements".
*   `shared_phenomena_pattern`: matches the pattern of shared phenomena, which is a string that starts with a capital letter, followed by lowercase letters, and ends with the word "information".

The function uses the `re.findall` function to find all matches of the patterns in the sentence. The matches are then added to the corresponding list in the `entities` dictionary.

In the test case, the sentence does not contain any matches for the entity types, so the function returns an empty list for each entity type. The output is a dictionary with empty lists for each entity type.

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\sinterfaces\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bexisting\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append(re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdata\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\simagery\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence).group())

    return {key: value for key, value in entities.items() if value}

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\sobject\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\sstripe\b|\b\w+\smagnetic\b|\b\w+\sdisk\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\saim\b|\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\sobjective\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdata\b|\b\w+\smessage\b|\b\w+\sstatus\b|\b\w+\serror\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [item for item in physical_device if item not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [item for item in environment_object if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [item for item in external_system if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [item for item in system_requirements if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object'] and item not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [item for item in shared_phenomena if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object'] and item not in entities['External System'] and item not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):

    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sUAV\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sDevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sObject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'To\s\w+\scontrol',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sidentifier\b|\b\w+\splan\b|\b\w+\scommand\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the entities
        entities = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the entities to the result dictionary
        result[key] = entities

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System will also provide connectivity to specifically identified Command, Control, Communications, Computers, and"))

The function uses regular expressions to match the entities against the schema definition. The schema definition is a dictionary where the keys are the entity types and the values are the regular expression patterns to match the entities. The function iterates over the schema definition, uses the regular expression to find the entities in the sentence, and adds the entities to the result dictionary. Finally, the function converts the result dictionary to a JSON string and returns it.

The regular expression patterns used in the schema definition are:
- `Software System`: `\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b` matches the string "the" followed by one or more word characters and then "System".
- `Physical Device`: `\b\w+\sDevice\b` matches one or more word characters followed by "Device".
- `Environment Object`: `\b\w+\sObject\b` matches one or more word characters followed by "Object".
- `External System`: `\b\w+\sSystem\b` matches one or more word characters followed by "System".
- `System Requirements`: `To\s\w+\scontrol` matches the string "To" followed by one or more word characters and then "control".
- `Shared Phenomena`: `\b\w+\sidentifier\b|\b\w+\splan\b|\b\w+\scommand\b` matches one or more word characters followed by "identifier", "plan", or "command".

The regular expression patterns are used with the `re.findall` function to find all occurrences of the entities in the sentence. The `re.findall` function returns a list of all matches, which is then added to the result dictionary.

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'to\s+provide\s+.*',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|tactical)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(All|all)\s+(computers|computers)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(an|An)\s+(open|Open)\s+(architecture|architecture)\b|\b(computers|computers)\b|\b(the|The)\s+(using|Using)\s+(Service|service)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|tactical)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(capable|Capable)\s+of\s+being\s+hosted\s+on\s+computers\s+that\s+are\s+typically\s+supported\s+by\s+the\s+using\s+Service\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(operating|Operating)\s+in\s+an\s+open\s+architecture\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|processor|equipment|device|system)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|patient|sun|old)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|communication network)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(to avoid|achieve|meet|respond|avoid|corruption|overflows|loss|deadlines|future requirements)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(data|information|messages|events|states|values|operational data|correlator hardware inputs|all data processing deadlines|anticipated future requirements)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(APA|Tactical|LCS|HAR|Center|System)\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(air|network|device|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\s+vehicle\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(battlefield|patient|sun|old|personnel|deployment concept|area of operations)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|tap)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s+support\s+([A-Z][a-z]+)\s+control\s+in\s+other\s+centers'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|LCS\s+identifier|HAR\s+identifier|username|password|message|C4I\s+connectivity|deployment\s+concept|area\s+of\s+operations'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [item for item in physical_devices if item not in entities['Software System']]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [item for item in environment_objects if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device']]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [item for item in external_systems if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object']]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [item for item in system_requirements if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object'] and item not in entities['External System']]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [item for item in shared_phenomena if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object'] and item not in entities['External System'] and item not in entities['System Requirements']]
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\sSystem)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\sdevice)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\sobject)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\sSystem)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(shall|should|must|can|will)\s(be|have|do|support|receive|translate|communicate|get|send|receive)\s(.+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[2] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\sconfiguration|(\w+\s)\w+|\w+\s\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ to be developed)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ and [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ unit\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'To support [a-z]+ [a-z]+ in other centers', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ request\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ command\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ identifier\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|tactical|Digital|digital|Correlator|correlator|APAF|apa|Monitor|monitor|Control|control|System|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(thermostat|thermostats|humidity|humidistats|contact|sensors|security|sound|light|alarms|power|switches|controllers|correlator|hardware|ETRAC|ETRACs|VLA|Expansion|Project|Monitor|system|ground|data|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|environment|controllers|sensors|temperature|humidity|security|sound|light|alarms|power|switches|correlator|hardware|ETRAC|ETRACs|VLA|Expansion|Project|Monitor|system|ground|data|system)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk|system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(error|handling|better|data|integrity|configuration|info|physical|hardware|configuration|info)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(status|error|messages|configuration|info|physical|hardware|configuration|info)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|an [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe [A-Z][a-z]+\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|an [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b|an [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+made\s+available\s+to\s+support\s+the\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)-formatted\s+data"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|NISN|local SwRI archive|public view)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|these interfaces|SwRI|NISN|NASA PDS)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|IDFS data sets|IDFS data sets|the ASPERA-3 IDFS data sets|a network connection|the existing system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|data transfers and distribution|the IDFS data sets)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the telemetry data|the data|current data|the telemetry|ASPERA-3 IDFS data|MEX OA IDFS data)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*personnel"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(database|card|disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+([a-zA-Z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([a-zA-Z\s]+)\s*and\s*([a-zA-Z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2))

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Digital|Tactical|CCTNS|DigitalHome)\s+(System|Systeme)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(contact|security|PDA|mobile|data|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|The)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|hard|disk|magnetic|stripe|card|tap)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to|for|should|shall|will|be)\s+(provide|support|use|develop|maintain|access|deploy|extend|connect|interface|maintain|interface)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(shared|set|events|states|values|between|connected|entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+receive\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:

    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+support\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+receive\s+configuration\s+information\s+from\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"To\s+support\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+and\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\sSystem)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\sComputer)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\sSystem)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(shall|will)\s(receive|process|export|disseminate|transfer|monitor)\s(.+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[2] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    for system in software_systems:
        entities['Software System'].append(system)

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    for device in physical_devices:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(device)

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for object in environment_objects:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(object)

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    for system in external_systems:
        entities['External System'].append(system)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    for requirement in system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(requirement)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    for phenomenon in shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(phenomenon)

    return entities

    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(DigitalHome|IDFS|CCTNS|NASA PDS|ASPERA-3|TCS|PDS)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(physical|instrument|device|data|information|message|data set|data sets|data set|data sets|data)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|NASA PDS|TCS|PDS|ASPERA-3|IDFS|CCTNS|DigitalHome|system|baseline|engineering|operator|evaluation|analysis|data|information|message|data set|data sets|data)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|NASA PDS|PDS|IDFS|CCTNS|DigitalHome|system|baseline|engineering|operator|evaluation|analysis|data|information|message|data set|data sets|data)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirement|requirement|aim|purpose|functionality|functionality|description|description|version|version|scientific|scientific|analysis|analysis|maintenance|maintenance)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(event|state|value|data|information|message|data set|data sets|data|physical|instrument|device|system|baseline|engineering|operator|evaluation|analysis|maintenance|maintenance)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?object"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"the\s+requirements"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?phenomena"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s+(\w+)\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(\w+)\s+device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(\w+)\s+the\s+\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(\w+)\s+database\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(\w+),\s+and\s+(\w+)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] + ' and ' + match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(\w+)\s+and\s+(\w+)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] + ' and ' + match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+s)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system network)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|must|should|can|will not|will not exist|shall not exist|must not exist|should not exist|can not exist|will|will exist|shall exist|must exist|should exist|can exist)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+s)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+system\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The system')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(power|hot-swapped)\s+switch\b'
    physical_device_pattern2 = r'\b(a|an)\s+(power|hot-swapped)\s+device\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence) or re.search(physical_device_pattern2, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('a power switch')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the)\s+(current)\s+(operational)\s+environment\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('the current operational environment')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(an)\s+(appliance)\b'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('an appliance')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(recovery|Startup)\s+State\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('Startup State')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the)\s+state\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('the state')

    return entities

        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ subsystem?)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device?)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ environment?)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system?)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to attempt recovery from failure|reboot the [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system?)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+ messages?)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|System|Center|LCS|Dynamic Lane)\s+(Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(LCS|Dynamic Lane)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(sun|patient|old|LCS|Dynamic Lane)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(During|To)\s+(support|control)\s+(in|for)\s+(other|this)\s+centers\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(' '.join(match))
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(device|network|username|password|lane|plan|level|interaction|configuration)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a)\s+(Tactical|Monitor|DigitalHome|alarm)\s+System\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|the)\s+(security|contact|correlator|user)\s+breach|sensor|power|message|array|operations|level|interaction\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|the)\s+(operator|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a)\s+(Monitor|DigitalHome|alarm|database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|allow|continue|prohibited|determined|clear|descriptive)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(status|error|message|OPEN|exceptional|condition)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

    }

    physical_device_pattern = r'The\s([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'

    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+System\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[2])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)(\s+device)?\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)\s+database?\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)(\s+requirement)?\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(the|a|an)?\s*(\w+)(\s+state)?\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+|\w+\s+\w+|\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(hot-swapped|recovery|startup|download|establishment|all)\s+(\w+|\w+\s+\w+|\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+|\w+\s+\w+|\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+|\w+\s+\w+|\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(recovery|startup|download|establishment|all)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(configuration|control|state|readiness)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
sentence = "The Tactical Control System hardware and software shall execute periodic Fault Detection/Location (FD/L) while in the Normal Operations Mode and Training Mode, to include a periodic determination of level of interaction."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Requirements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

def extract_entities(sentence):

        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Physical Device

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe [a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ operating system\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bshall be capable of\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ signals\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {

        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Master|Correlator|Tactical|Monitor|Control|Computer|System)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:Network|Correlator|Master|Computer|Workstation|Human|Interface|Card|Disk|Tap|Device)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a|an)\s+(?:patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:database|magnetic|stripe|card|hard|disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b|[^\w\s]', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'computer', 'correlator'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'router', 'switch', 'computer', 'equipment'],
        'Environment Object': ['patient', 'sun', 'old'],
        'External System': ['database', 'card', 'tap', 'disk'],
        'System Requirements': ['require', 'need', 'must', 'shall'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value']
    }

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Extract entities
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if token.lower() in keywords:
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return extracted_entities
