```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sworkstation\b|\b\w+\scomputer\b|\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
```
```python
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System|Center-to-Center|Maintenance Operations Mode)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(primary and backup power)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the\s+patient|the\s+sun|the\s+old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|should|must|can|will)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(mode operations|activities|functions|software upgrade|software debug|operations|interaction)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(Software|System)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(controllers|sensors|computers|peripherals|hard disk|tap|database|magnetic stripe card|home|sun|old|patient)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(home|sun|old|patient)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|hard disk|tap)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(shall|will|shall be|will be|shall have|will have|shall be able to|will be able to|can|could|should|must|need to|have to|is required to|is supposed to|is expected to|is intended to|is designed to|is meant to|is supposed to be|is expected to be|is intended to be|is designed to be|is meant to be|is required to be|is supposed to have|is expected to have|is intended to have|is designed to have|is meant to have|is required to have|is supposed to be able to|is expected to be able to|is intended to be able to|is designed to be able to|is meant to be able to|is required to be able to|is supposed to have|is expected to have|is intended to have|is designed to have|is meant to have|is required to have|is supposed to be able to|is expected to be able to|is intended to be able to|is designed to be able to|is meant to be able to|is required to be able to)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(coordinate|shutdown|power outage|prolonged|event|state|values|events|states)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("There shall be no modes of operation in the shutdown state."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\sComputer\b|\b\w+\s\w+\sHardware\b',
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\smanagement\b|\b\w+\s\w+\sdata\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\sdata\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        if pattern:
            matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
            result[entity_type] = matches
        else:
            result[entity_type] = []

    return result
```

```python
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'

    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Center|Correlator|Monitor|C-2-C|Tactical)\s+(Control|GUI|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(A|a)\s+(thermostat|master|public|Internet)\s+(unit|control|network)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|the)\s+(public|old|sun|patient|Internet)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|The)\s+(C-2-C|Monitor|Control)\s+(System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(transfer|monitor|conduct|execute)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(status|error|equipment|dynamic|wireless|C4I)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System will allow the operator to conduct C4I system interface."))
```

The code defines a function `extract_entities` that takes a sentence as input and returns a dictionary with the extracted entities. The function uses regular expressions to match the entities against the schema definition. The regular expressions are defined as patterns that match the entity types. The function then iterates over the matches and adds them to the corresponding list in the dictionary. If no matches are found for a particular entity type, an empty list is added to the dictionary. The function returns the dictionary with the extracted entities.

The regular expressions used in the code are:

*   `software_system_pattern`: Matches the Software System entity type, which consists of "The" or "the" followed by a word that starts with "Center", "Correlator", "Monitor", "C-2-C", or "Tactical", followed by "Control" or "GUI" or "System".

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\smagnetic\sstripe\b|\b\w+\stap\b|\b\w+\shard\sdisk\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sdata\b|\b\w+\sinfo\b|\b\w+\sconfiguration\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|process|translate|aid)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(2))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|process|translate|aid)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+hardware\s+configuration"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(2))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|process|translate|aid)\s+personnel"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append("personnel")

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|process|translate|aid)\s+data\s+from\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(2))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|process|translate|aid)\s+to\s+(transfer|monitor)\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(3))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|receive|process|translate|aid)\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|transfer|provide|access)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|transfer|provide|access)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+hardware\s+configuration"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|transfer|provide|access)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+configuration"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|transfer|provide|access)\s+configuration\s+information\s+from\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|transfer|provide|access)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+configuration"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|transfer|provide|access)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+configuration"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return entities
```

```python
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|send|get|process|translate|transfer|monitor|control|use|utilize|implement|support|deploy|contain|include|require)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+hardware\s+configuration\s+for\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|send|get|process|translate|transfer|monitor|control|use|utilize|implement|support|deploy|contain|include|require)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+information\s+from\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|send|get|process|translate|transfer|monitor|control|use|utilize|implement|support|deploy|contain|include|require)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+information\s+from\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+System"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[3].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|send|get|process|translate|transfer|monitor|control|use|utilize|implement|support|deploy|contain|include|require)\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|send|get|process|translate|transfer|monitor|control|use|utilize|implement|support|deploy|contain|include|require)\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "Upon completion of radar cross section analysis and characterization by the Government for each UAV type, Tactical Control System shall utilize a UAV signature versus threat lookup table (database) that identity the lethality of the threat to the UAV [SSS065], and shall provide the capability of displaying aircraft signature versus threat, before and during flight."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bSoftware System\b|\bSystem\b|\bSystem\s+to\s+be\s+developed\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bdevice\b|\bhardware\b|\bphysical\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bentity\b|\bobject\b|\bphenomena\b',
        'External System': r'\bdatabase\b|\bcard\b|\bstripe\b|\bhard\sdisk\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\brequirement\b|\baim\b|\bpurpose\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bevent\b|\bstate\b|\bvalue\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Identify the entity types for each token
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
            if re.search(pattern, token):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(extracted_entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [item for item in physical_device if item not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [item for item in environment_object if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [item for item in external_system if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [item for item in system_requirements if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object'] and item not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [item for item in shared_phenomena if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object'] and item not in entities['External System'] and item not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Correlator|Master|Tactical)\s+(Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|The)\s+(Correlator|Master|Tactical)\s+(hardware|computer)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(these|These)\s+interfaces\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|The)\s+(existing|VLA)\s+(system|Expansion|Project|Monitor|Control)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|The)\s+(capability|shall|provide)\s+(the|to)\s+(print|receive|send)\s+(data|information)\s+in\s+(alphanumeric|format)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[3] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(messages|data|information|time|models|standards|corrections|control|configuration|hardware|software|system|requirements|information|data|messages|waypoint|format)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s+(?:Center|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Tactical Control System)'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(?:Reversible Lane|Traffic Signal|ramp meter|correlator hardware)'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(?:the\s+sun|the\s+old|the\s+patient|a\s+(?:Reversible Lane|Traffic Signal|ramp meter))'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(?:VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System)'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append(re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(?:To support\s+(?:Reversible Lane|Traffic Signal|Ramp Meter|correlator|AV route) control in other centers)'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(?:device control command|network identifier|reversible lane identifier|username|password|plan|duration|configuration information|flight route plan|waypoint|correlator hardware configuration)'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence))

    return entities
```

```python
    }
    
    # Software System

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sDevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Center|System|Server|Application|Software|Platform)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Device|Machine|Equipment|Hardware|Sensor|Actuator)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Object|Entity|Thing|Item|Resource|Person)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Database|System|Server|Application|Software|Platform|Device|Machine|Equipment|Hardware|Sensor|Actuator)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s+support\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+in\s+other\s+centers,\s+the\s+Center\s+shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0] + ' ' + match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(network|dynamic|traffic|device|username|password|lane|traffic|signal|identifier|plan)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = list(set(shared_phenomena_matches))

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

```python
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema definition
    for entity_type, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|an|a)\s+(APA|Data|System|Software)\s+(system|data|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(validated|6)\s+degree-of-freedom\s+air\s+vehicle\s+simulator\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(users|operators)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(all|flight|planning|calculations)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(when|compared|with|a|mission|flown|by|a|validated|6|degree-of-freedom|air|vehicle|simulator)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(APF|APF system|APF data system|flight route plan|EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System|APAF system|APAF data system|flight)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [item[1] for item in software_systems]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(flight|correlator|all correlator)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [item[1] for item in physical_devices]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(recovery area|patient|sun|old|users|operators|personnel|designated recovery area)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [item[1] for item in environment_objects]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|APAF Operations Procedures Document)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [item[1] for item in external_systems]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|minimum)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [item[0] for item in system_requirements]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(all correlator configuration/control events|programmed flight|autonomously execute|restored|exhausted|parameters)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [item[0] for item in shared_phenomena]
    
    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The flight route plan, as a minimum, shall provide the necessary AV commands to autonomously execute a programmed flight and return to a designated recovery area."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s+(?:Center|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Tactical Control System)'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(?:ramp meter|Traffic Signal|Reversible Lane)'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(?:sun|patient|old|the sun|the patient|the old)'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(?:VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System)'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append(re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(?:To support Ramp Meter control in other centers|To support Traffic Signal control in other centers|To support Reversible Lane control in other centers|The Tactical Control System shall provide the capability to create waypoints that define the desired flight path, define AV Altitude and Airspeed associated with the waypoint.)'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(?:device control command|network identifier|Ramp Meter identifier|username|password|plan|traffic signal identifier|traffic signal plan identifier|reversible lane identifier|duration|configuration information|a physical correlator hardware configuration)'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence))

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
```
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
```python
    # Define the schema and entity extraction rules
    schema = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    rules = {
        'Software System': r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Remote|Monitor|Center|GUI|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(network|device|port|identifier)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old|AV)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|card|tap|hard disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(shall|must|should)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(status|error|message|command|control|request|response)\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in schema}

    # Extract entities for each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in rules.items():
        for token in tokens:
            if re.match(pattern, token):
                entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk.corpus import stopwords
from string import punctuation

nltk.download('punkt')
nltk.download('stopwords')

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence.lower())
    
    # Remove punctuation and special characters
    tokens = [token for token in tokens if token not in punctuation and not token.isnumeric()]
    
    # Remove stopwords
    stop_words = set(stopwords.words('english'))
    tokens = [token for token in tokens if token not in stop_words]
    
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Identify the entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software']:
            schema['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'physical']:
            schema['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['object', 'environment']:
            schema['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['system', 'external']:
            schema['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['requirement', 'system']:
            schema['System Requirements'].append(token)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Incident|Tactical|Correlator|Map|GUI)\s+(GUI|Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2])
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(map|VCI|DTED)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(map|patient|sun|old|LCS|DMS|DTED)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(capable|provide|graphically|display|implement|using|ESRI|Map|Objects)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(displaying|versus|profile|Line|of|Sight|terrain)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall provide the capability to graphically display Line of Sight versus terrain profile (DTED)."))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
```python
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

def extract_entities(sentence):

```python
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System

    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide)\s+the\s+capability\sto\s+(?:display|show|support|allow)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+Device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide)\s+the\s+capability\sto\s+(?:display|show|support|allow)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide)\s+the\s+capability\sto\s+(?:display|show|support|allow)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+System"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"To\s+support\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|have|provide)\s+the\s+capability\sto\s+(?:display|show|support|allow)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sAVs\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\spersonnel\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sOperations\sProcedures\sDocument\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\scontrol\sfunctionality\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sBLOS\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sSystem"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sunit"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\ssignals"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe [a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ tools\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ shall be capable of\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ wide configuration|a low level [A-Z][a-z]+ command line instruction\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

```python
    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return entity_types
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?System'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace('System', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?device'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group().replace('device', ''))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group().replace('system', ''))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s+support\s+[A-Z][a-z]+'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(?:[a-z]+ )?(?:[a-z]+ )?(?:[a-z]+ )?(?:[a-z]+ )?(?:[a-z]+ )?(?:[a-z]+ )?'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        shared_phenomena_list = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_list

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall provide the capability to fully control and display the AV's Identification Friend or Foe"))
``` 

    }

```python
    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, value in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(value, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    result = json.dumps(result)
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
```

```python
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the entities
        entities = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the entities to the result dictionary
        result[key] = entities

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?System\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?Device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?Object\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?System\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?Requirements\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?Phenomena\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
```python
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
```
```python
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
```
```python
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Requirements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|a [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ shall|the [A-Z][a-z]+ shall)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|status and error messages|wireless signals|wireless communications)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|a [a-z]+|a [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ to [a-z]+|the [a-z]+ to [a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ and [a-z]+ alarms\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+s\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ subsystem\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ error handling for better data integrity\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ and [a-z]+ subsystems\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+(?:Correlator\s+)?Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bMonitor\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\boperator\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bTactical\s+Control\s+System\b'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append(re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bpresent\s+sufficient\s+cues\b|\bimplement\s+and\s+monitor\s+automatic\s+launch\s+and\s+recovery\b|\binitiate\s+abort\s+procedures\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
        entities['System Requirements'].extend(system_requirements)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bautomatic\s+launch\s+and\s+recovery\b|\babort\s+procedures\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena)

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
                entities[entity_type].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bthe [a-z]+s\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe [a-z]+s\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+s\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
```python
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bshall\s+.*\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'application', 'program'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'machine', 'equipment', 'hardware'],
        'Environment Object': ['object', 'entity', 'thing', 'phenomenon'],
        'External System': ['database', 'file', 'network', 'system'],
        'System Requirements': ['requirement', 'need', 'goal', 'aim'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value', 'information']
    }

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

    # Extract entities
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if any(keyword in token for keyword in keywords):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities
```

def extract_entities(sentence):

```python
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ requirement)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sSystem"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sdevice"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sExpansion\sProject\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sposition"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities
```

    }

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|the\s\w+|an\s\w+|a\s\w+|the\s\w+|an\s\w+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|a\s\w+|the\s\w+|an\s\w+|a\s\w+|the\s\w+|an\s\w+'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|shall|shall\s\w+|shall\s\w+|shall\s\w+|shall\s\w+|shall\s\w+'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|shall|shall\s\w+|shall\s\w+|shall\s\w+|shall\s\w+|shall\s\w+'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

import re
```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ unit\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b|[^\w\s]', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'unit', 'control', 'thermostat', 'master', 'air', 'vehicle'],
        'Environment Object': ['patient', 'sun', 'old'],
        'External System': ['database', 'magnetic', 'stripe', 'card', 'tap', 'hard', 'disk'],
        'System Requirements': ['shall', 'must', 'require', 'need'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['communication', 'means', 'network', 'identifier', 'username', 'password', 'plan', 'identifier']
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        token = token.strip('.,!?"\'')
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if any(keyword in token.lower() for keyword in keywords):
                result[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(APA|ground|data|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(device|computer|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(no|safety|requirement|aim|purpose|system|develop)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(shared|events|states|values|connected|entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sdata\b', sentence)

    return entities
```
