```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|CCTNS|APAF|Backend|Tactical Control|CCTNS|APAF ground data)\s+(System|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(secondary|virtual)\s+(network|interface)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(these|the)\s+(interfaces|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(existing|Backend|selected)\s+(system|AV)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(ensure|implement|have|shall)\s+(high|better|built-in|proper|timely|robust)\s+(standards|security|access|control|error|handling|data|integrity|format|communications)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Specific|the|incoming|user)\s+(data|request|format|communications)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'(\w+ to \w+ infrastructure|the \w+ system|the \w+ architecture|the \w+ interface|the \w+ deployment|the \w+ infrastructure|the \w+ architecture|the \w+ system|the \w+ interface|the \w+ deployment)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+ device|the \w+ device|the \w+ interface|the \w+ system|the \w+ deployment|the \w+ infrastructure|the \w+ architecture)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+ interfaces|the \w+ interfaces|the \w+ system|the \w+ deployment|the \w+ infrastructure|the \w+ architecture|the \w+ environment|the \w+ world)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+ system|the \w+ system|the \w+ interface|the \w+ deployment|the \w+ infrastructure|the \w+ architecture|the \w+ existing system|the \w+ existing systems)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(\w+ to \w+ infrastructure|the \w+ system|the \w+ architecture|the \w+ interface|the \w+ deployment|the \w+ infrastructure|the \w+ architecture|the \w+ system|the \w+ interface|the \w+ deployment)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+ data|the \w+ data|the \w+ information|the \w+ messages|the \w+ events|the \w+ states|the \w+ values)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ unit\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ database\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bTo support [A-Z][a-z]+ control in other centers\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ signals\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the entities
        entities = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the entities to the result dictionary
        result[key] = entities

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
    }
```

```python
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
```

```python
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|a\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|to\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|a\s\w+\b|to\s\w+\b'

    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
```

```python
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+(?:Tactical|Correlator|Monitor and Control System)\s+System\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The system')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(?:power|uninterruptible)\s+supply\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('an uninterruptible power supply')
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(?:thermostat|master)\s+control\s+unit\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('A thermostat unit')
        entities['Physical Device'].append('the master control unit')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(?:sun|patient|old)\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('the sun')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('the patient')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('the old')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(?:database|magnetic|hard)\s+disk\b'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('a database')
        entities['External System'].append('a magnetic stripe card')
        entities['External System'].append('a tap')
        entities['External System'].append('hard disk')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(system|power|shutdown|prolonged|power|outage)\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('system wide shutdown')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('prolonged power outage')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(state|signals|event|failure|power|control)\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('the state')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('wireless signals')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('an event')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('a failure')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('power')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('control')

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Tactical|Master|Correlator|Control|System|design|layer)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Master|Correlator|Control|Computer)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(safety|error|debug|data|configuration|information|performance|nuclear)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(error|debug|messages|data|configuration|information|performance|safety|nuclear)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Correlator|CCTNS|Tactical|alarm)\s+(Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(security|contact)\s+(breach|sensor)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(unauthorized|equipment|personnel)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|this)\s+(alarm|Monitor|Control)\s+(System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(ensure|eliminate|control)\s+(high|potential)\s+(standards|hazards)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0] + ' ' + match[1] + ' ' + match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(OPEN|continue|fail)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

# Test the function
``` 

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
```python
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sUAV\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\soperator\b',
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': r'\ba\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # If the pattern is a list, skip it
        if isinstance(pattern, list):
            continue
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\sunit\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\smagnetic\b|\b\w+\stap\b|\b\w+\shard\sbisc\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\saim\b|\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\sneed\b|\b\w+\sshall\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdata\b|\b\w+\sstate\b|\b\w+\sevent\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Requirements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(input_string):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Correlator|EVLA|CCTNS|APAF|other)\s+Monitor\s+(and|or)\s+Control\s+System\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, input_string, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3] + ' ' + match[4] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(tap|hard\sdisk|database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|other)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, input_string, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|personnel|other)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, input_string, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|tap|hard\sdisk|other)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, input_string, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(system\s+design|safety|human\s+engineering|other)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, input_string, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(events|states|values|other)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, input_string, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ sensors|security alarms)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(built-in error handling for better data integrity)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(status and error messages)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
```python
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bcomputer\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\ssoftware\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\srequirements\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the )?(Correlator Monitor and Control System|Tactical Control System)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(All computers|users|operators|maintainers|personnel)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(users|operators|maintainers|personnel|ASPERA-3 Co-I\'s|APAF)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(ASPERA-3 and MEX OA IDFS data|intermediate files|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry|maintenance and monitoring through remote logins)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(maintenance and monitoring through remote logins)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(ASPERA-3 and MEX OA IDFS data|intermediate files|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(APA|ground|data|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(tap|hard\ disk|database|magnetic\ stripe\ card|patient|sun|old)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic\ stripe\ card|tap|hard\ disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(system|product|user|desired|ground|data|system)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(shared|events|states|values|connected|entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sSystem'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+)\s(?:hardware|device|system)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+)\s(?:operating\s(system|system)|system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(?:shall|can|will)\s(?:be|have|support|receive|process|transfer|monitor|control)\s([A-Za-z\s,]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(?:video|telemetry|data|information|configuration|status|signals|control|dynamic|data|messages)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0).strip())

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Computer|Device|Hardware)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(Patient|User|Environment|Object)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(Database|Card|Disk|System)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(Requirement|Purpose|Maintenance|Monitoring|Access|Security|Restriction)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(Event|State|Value|Phenomena|Shared)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in software_systems:
        if word not in entities['Software System']:
            entities['Software System'].append(word)
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in physical_devices:
        if word not in entities['Physical Device']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(word)
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in environment_objects:
        if word not in entities['Environment Object']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(word)
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in external_systems:
        if word not in entities['External System']:
            entities['External System'].append(word)
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in system_requirements:
        if word not in entities['System Requirements']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(word)
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in shared_phenomena:
        if word not in entities['Shared Phenomena']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(word)
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {

    }

```python
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(thermostat|master|humidistats|controllers|sensors|contact|security|light|power|airborne|shipboard|electrical|power|sources|system|unit)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|DoD|family|ground|mobile|airborne|shipboard)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|card|tap|disk|HVAC|Heating|Ventilation|Air|Conditioning|system|systems)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(system|shall|be|use|communicate)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(wireless|standard|electrical|power|signals)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sdevices\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bshall\sbe\scapable\sof\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bshall\smonitor\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bshall\stake\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bshall\srecover\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bshall\savoid\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bshall\srestore\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\bpower\soutage\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\bcritical\smission\sdata\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\bair\svehicle\scontrol\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\btime\sremaining\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\bsignal\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall be capable of restoring power in sufficient time to avoid loss of critical mission data and loss of air vehicle control during power outages."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The Tactical Control System throughput shall not exceed 50% of the throughput capability delivered over any 10 second period, and as an objective throughput shall not exceed 25% of throughput capability delivered over any 10 second period."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*UAVs?"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*System"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"level\s*(\d+)\s*through\s*level\s*(\d+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(f"level {system_requirements_match.group(1)} through level {system_requirements_match.group(2)}")

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"a\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*instruction"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ software)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ to be capable of [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(device|hardware)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(database|card|disk)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|should|must)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+be\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a )?(UAV )?(operator )?(trained )?(on )?(one )?(system )?(to )?(control )?(different )?(types )?(of )?(UAVs )?(as )?(well )?(as )?(UAV )?(payloads )?(with )?(minimal )?(additional )?(training)\.)'

    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(minimal )?(additional )?(training)\.)'

    return entities
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b|[^\w\s]', sentence)

    # Define the entity extraction function
    def extract_software_system(tokens):
        return []

    def extract_physical_device(tokens):
        return []

    def extract_environment_object(tokens):
        return [token for token in tokens if token.lower() not in ['the', 'a', 'an', 'is', 'are', 'be', 'been', 'being', 'has', 'have', 'had', 'do', 'does', 'did', 'will', 'would', 'shall', 'should', 'may', 'might', 'must', 'can', 'could', 'ought', 'shall', 'should', 'will', 'would']]

    def extract_external_system(tokens):
        return [token for token in tokens if token.lower() in ['database', 'magnetic stripe card', 'tap', 'hard disk']]

    def extract_system_requirements(tokens):
        return [token for token in tokens if token.lower() in ['provide', 'depict', 'display', 'show', 'indicate', 'inform', 'notify', 'alert', 'warn', 'signal', 'cue', 'prompt', 'remind', 'suggest', 'recommend', 'advise', 'inform', 'notify', 'alert', 'warn', 'signal', 'cue', 'prompt', 'remind', 'suggest', 'recommend', 'advise']]

    def extract_shared_phenomena(tokens):
        return [token for token in tokens if token.lower() in ['speed', 'position', 'path', 'waypoint', 'graphics', 'map', 'display', 'window', 'foreground', 'background']]

    # Extract entities for each type
    entities = {
        'Software System': extract_software_system(tokens),
        'Physical Device': extract_physical_device(tokens),
        'Environment Object': extract_environment_object(tokens),
        'External System': extract_external_system(tokens),
        'System Requirements': extract_system_requirements(tokens),
        'Shared Phenomena': extract_shared_phenomena(tokens)
    }

    # Return the extracted entities
    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Remote|Graphical|Correlator|Workstation|User|System|Interface|Control|Monitor|GUI)\s+(GUI|Monitor|Control|System|Interface|Software|Console|Window|Menu|Interface|Console)\b', sentence)
    for system in software_systems:
        entities['Software System'].append(system[2])
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Control|Console|Display|Window|Menu|Interface|Monitor|GUI)\s+(Console|Window|Menu|Interface|Monitor|GUI)\b', sentence)
    for device in physical_devices:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(device[2])
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(User|Patient|Sun|Old)\b', sentence)
    for object in environment_objects:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(object[2])
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Database|Card|Tap|Disk|Tools|System)\b', sentence)
    for system in external_systems:
        entities['External System'].append(system[2])
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(To|For|That|Shall|Will|Can|May|Must|Should|Could|Would|Is|Are|Am|Be|Been|Being|Has|Have|Had|Do|Does|Did|Will|Would|Shall|Should|Can|Could)\s+(view|access|configure|control|play|reveal|present|display|show|have|get|send|receive|store|send|receive)\s+(a|an)\s+(general|low|system|basic|interface|menu|window|screen|instruction)\b', sentence)
    for requirement in system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(' '.join(requirement))
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(Shared|Common|System|Interface|Menu|Window|Screen|Instruction|Configuration|Control|Play|View|Access|Configure|Control)\b', sentence)
    for phenomenon in shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(phenomenon)
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Each control console shall have a display windows that presents the interface menus for workstation software."))
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(digital programmable|magnetic alarm|contact|power|display|monitor|thermostat|humidistat|alarm|switch|sensor|tap|hard disk|database|card|stripe|tap|hard disk|database|card|stripe)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(the|an|a|old|sun|patient|door|window|space|sun|patient|door|window|space)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(read|monitor|regulate|update|include|have|allow|get|send|receive|store|record|display|show|display|show)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(temperature|humidity|entry|light|sunlight|level|condition|state|value|event|state|value|event)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, value in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(value, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Center-to-Center|CCTNS|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(map|link|screen|text|device|card|disk|stripe|tap)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(patient|sun|old|map|link|screen|text|device|card|disk|stripe|tap)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|card|disk|stripe|tap|standard|ISO|TMDD|MIL-STD|guidelines)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(require|shall|should|must|need|aim|purpose|depict|transmit|consult|follow)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(standard|ISO|TMDD|MIL-STD|guidelines|speed|text|legibility|color|flash|frequencies)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    for match in physical_device_matches:

    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(personnel|user|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic\stipe\scard|tap|hard\sdisk|alarm|system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(hardware|software|repair|message|error|condition|action|response|acknowledgment|faults|warning|flags|fault)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(error|message|warning|flags|fault|reboot|requests|self-heal|attempts|alert|notice|acknowledgment|response|condition|action|faults|critical|warning|flags|OPEN|CLOSED)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sCorrelator\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"all\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\sbe\swithout\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\sdata"
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(1))

    return entities

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(A|an|the)\s+(Center|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(device|device\s+status\s+requestor)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|operator)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|tap|hard\s+disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(prompt|send|provide)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(alerts|email|SMS|network\s+identifier|device\s+type|command\s+timeframe\s+request|input|output|source|destination|port)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ switch\b|\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ contact\b|\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ card\b|\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ disk\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ database\b|\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ stripe\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',

    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|The [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ hardware|hardware monitor|hardware control|hardware diagnostics|tap|hard disk)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|The [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall be capable of|should be extensible to|shall be implemented using|shall be designed and implemented in accordance with|to provide access to the interfaces|with support for standalone test bench operation|with simulated control data generation|with support for|with the ability to access and upgrade)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(shared events|states and values|between the connected entities)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bthe\s\w+\sworkstation\b|\bany\savailable\smonitor\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe\s\w+\b',
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': r'\bdisplay\sall\sHCI\selements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # If the pattern is a list, skip it
        if isinstance(pattern, list):
            continue
        # Use regular expression to find the pattern in the sentence
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(EVLA|Correlator|Monitor|Control|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(all|any|the)\s+(correlator|device|status|requestor|center|system)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(maximum|minimum|shall|provide|functionality|delay|time|second|operator|command|system|acknowledgement|response)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(information|network|identifier|device|type|days|commands|accepted|times|request|queue|parameter|event|configuration|control|communication|restored)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\sHCI\b', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\bPDA\'s\b|\bmobile\sdatabaseterminals\b', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ subsystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'Correlator', 'Monitor', 'Control'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'computer', 'VCI', 'Master', 'Correlator'],
        'Environment Object': ['patient', 'sun', 'old'],
        'External System': ['database', 'magnetic', 'stripe', 'card', 'tap', 'hard', 'disk'],
        'System Requirements': ['require', 'aim', 'purpose', 'develop'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value']
    }

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Extract entities for each entity type
    for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
        for token in tokens:
            if any(keyword in token for keyword in keywords):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return extracted_entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(.*)\s+(System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(.*)\s+(device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(.*)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(.*)\s+(database|card|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|should|can|will)\s+(.*)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(dynamic|static|shared)\s+(.*)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Define the entity extraction rules
    rules = {
        'Software System': lambda x: [x[0] if x[0].istitle() else x[0].capitalize()],
        'Physical Device': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['equipment', 'device', 'network', 'system']],
        'Environment Object': lambda x: [],
        'External System': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk', 'network']],
        'System Requirements': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose']],
        'Shared Phenomena': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['data', 'event', 'state', 'value']]
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    entities = {key: value(tokens) for key, value in rules.items()}

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
```python
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result
```
